briefTitle: A Human Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Aged Garlic Powder on Improvement of Blood Lipids in Subjects With Hyperlipidemia

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Mild hypercholesterolemic subjects aged from 20 to 80 years
* had no received lipid-lowering drugs for at least 3 months prior to the recruitment

Exclusion Criteria:

* self-reported pregnancy,lactation
* prevalent heart disease,cancer,renal disorder, or diabetes mellitus, and use of lipid or antihypertensive medications

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in LDL-cholesterol(Low Density Lipoprotein - Cholesterol)
outcomeMeasures.description: LDL-C(Low Density Lipoprotein - cholesterol) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in HDL-Cholesterol(High Density Lipoprotein - Cholesterol)
outcomeMeasures.description: HDL-cholesterol(High Density Lipoprotein - cholesterol) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Triglycerides
outcomeMeasures.description: Triglyceride was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Total Cholesterol
outcomeMeasures.description: Total cholesterol was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Apo-A1(Apolipoprotein A1)
outcomeMeasures.description: Apo-A1(Apolipoprotein A1) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Apo-B(Apolipoprotein B)
outcomeMeasures.description: Apo-B(Apolipoprotein B) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in FFA(Free Fatty Acid)
outcomeMeasures.description: FFA(free fatty acid) was measured in study visit 1(0 week) and visit 3(12 week).
